value.title: Email Reminder – Turn your inbox into a simple reminder system
value.content:
Email Reminder is built for busy professionals, freelancers, and small business owners who live in their email inbox. Instead of juggling task apps, you can create simple one-time or recurring reminders that arrive exactly when you need them. Flexible scheduling (hourly, daily, weekly, bi-weekly, monthly, bi-monthly, yearly, or fully custom). Manage everything in a clean, minimal dashboard. Free tier + paid plans, with AppSumo lifetime deal support. It’s the easiest way to keep important tasks top of mind without changing your workflow.
View startup

value.title: Apprvd – A radically simple contract platform with powerful, AI-enhanced features
value.content:
Apprvd is a simple contract management platform for small and growing teams. It lets you draft from templates, flag risky clauses with AI, and collaborate in a web editor instead of passing Word docs around. Contracts can be signed securely, tracked for renewals and obligations, and searched easily so nothing slips through the cracks. It’s an affordable way to keep deals moving while staying in control.
View startup

value.title: creafico – AI video analysis to increase engagement and grow faster on Reels or TikTok
value.content:
creafico is an AI‑powered analysis tool for short‑form videos. Upload your video, and it pinpoints weak hooks, pacing slips, and retention dips, then delivers clear, time‑stamped tips to fix them. With faster feedback you can sharpen each clip, boost engagement, and grow quicker on social media.
View startup

value.title: Uplogr – Uplogr is a social changelog platform for builders
value.content:
Uplogr is a social changelog platform that helps indie builders and product teams share updates, track progress, and build in public. Users can share updates, maintain a public changelog, and stay consistent with build streaks. Pro features like feedback collection, polls, shareable questionnaires and a knowledge base make it easy to engage your audience and grow with your community.
View startup

value.title: 120 AI Chat – An AI chat app that feels instant.
value.content:
120 AI Chat is a native desktop client built for speed and reliability, not a slow web wrapper. Designed for macOS (with Windows and Linux coming soon), it lets you run multiple chat threads, use reasoning models, generate images with models like GPT Image 1 or Stable Diffusion, connect to Hugging Face or OpenRouter, etc.
120 AI Chat gives developers, writers, and everyday users a tool they enjoy using, with more on the way—like Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), Model Context Protocol (MCP), and full Windows and Linux support.
View startup

value.title: PosCow – Squarespace e-commerce plugin for international sales
value.content:
Upgrade Squarespace store to enable global shopping. Get instant international shipping quotes, AI-generated social content, automatic tax/VAT/GST calculations, and a seamless checkout experience.
View startup

value.title: Velin AI: F**k interview-coder apps – Use real-time AI in screen calls undetected for ANY USECASE
value.content:
Velin is a click-through AI desktop app, invisible in screen calls, that delivers real-time AI responses on whatever you're doing without disrupting your flow. Unlike other tools that require constant prompting, Velin AI stays on screen and adapts to whatever you’re doing—whether it’s a live interview, online test, coding session, sales call, or even gaming. You can create or select from specialized AI setups, save transcripts and notes instantly, and run multiple AI jobs in parallel. Fully undetectable in calls, meetings, and recordings, Velin AI is the ultimate productivity companion for anyone in high-pressure, high-performance situations.
View startup

value.title: MindMirror – It’s not just a note app; it’s your quick-access memory assistant
value.content:
MindMirror is a note-taking app built for people who want answers, not folders.
Just drop in a note, upload a file, or import from other apps, no organizing required. Ask MindMirror any question, and it searches your entire knowledge base to give you answers instantly.
View startup

value.title: BestLanding – AI-Powered A/B Testing for Headlines & CTAs
value.content:
Stop guessing what works.
BestLanding helps you find the winning headline and CTA for your website faster. Our AI automatically generates copy variations and launches A/B tests in minutes — giving you statistically significant results in days, not weeks.
Key Features:
- Automatic Copy Generation: Get powerful headline and CTA variations created instantly by AI.
- Fast & Smart A/B Tests: Launch tests in minutes and get instant, actionable insights.
- AI-powered Copy Analysis: Improve your copy’s clarity and persuasion with intelligent feedback.
- Real-time Analytics Dashboard: Track your tests' performance with a live dashboard to make smart decisions.
View startup

value.title: BookingTerminal – The Modern Booking Platform for Tour & Activity Operators
value.content:
BookingTerminal is a modern booking platform built for tour and activity operators. Legacy systems burden operators with clunky dashboards, generic support, and rising costs—distracting them from running their business. BookingTerminal simplifies powerful online booking tools into a clean, intuitive experience, backed by high-touch, personalized support. Operators can easily accept real-time bookings, streamline operations, and focus on delivering great experiences—not troubleshooting software. All this comes at a lower-than-average 3% online booking fee, making BookingTerminal the modern choice for the current and next generation of operators.
View startup

value.title: Did I Reply? – Free Gmail Reminders & Templates
value.content:
Did I Reply? is a Chrome extension that helps you set follow-up reminders and insert reusable email templates directly inside Gmail.
View startup

value.title: NexNotes AI – Content to clarity- for free in seconds
value.content:
NexNotes AI has all the features needed for studying and research. Just upload any type of file and get:
Possible doubts that can arise from content.

Mindmaps and diagrams (custom)
Quizzes with customized difficulty
Vocab extraction
Humanized text
Handwritten text
It can solve your questions
Flashcards
Ppts
Grammar correction
You even get progress and dashboard
A complete study plan and even a summary- all for free. So you can say it is a true distraction free one stop ai powered study solution. The good thing is everything can be customized.

View startup

value.title: DevKnife – One app for your daily dev tasks
value.content:
DevKnife is a macOS app that puts everyday developer tools in one place. It includes a JSON editor and formatter, text compare, JWT decoder, IP location lookup, port scanner, and many more.
Instead of switching between websites, CLI tools, and separate apps, you can open DevKnife and handle these tasks quickly in one native app.
View startup

value.title: Finderlock – One click in Finder is all it takes
value.content:
Finderlock is a native macOS app to lock files and folders using Touch ID or password with AES-256 encryption. Local-only. Free plan included.
View startup

value.title: Text-Well – The AI Writing Assistant with a Built-in Review Committee
value.content:
Text-Well is a writing assistant designed to help you see your work from new perspectives. It starts with a powerful AI Check to catch grammar mistakes, fix awkward phrasing, and improve the overall clarity of your text, ensuring your writing is polished and professional.
But where it truly helps is with its AI Review Panel. Instead of just getting corrections, you get feedback from a small team of virtual, AI-powered experts. This panel simulates how different people—like a skeptical customer or a detail-oriented editor—might react to your
View startup

value.title: StackPilot – From alert to PR, automatically
value.content:
StackPilot is a cutting-edge AI tool designed to enhance your software development workflow. It offers
seamless integration with existing systems, providing real-time data analysis and predictive insights to
optimize performance and efficiency. Whether you're managing small projects or overseeing large
deployments, StackPilot empowers developers to make informed decisions, streamline processes, and
increase productivity. With its user-friendly interface and robust features, StackPilot is the perfect
solution for teams looking to innovate and achieve excellence in the software development life cycle.
View startup

value.title: Askmastr – A community-driven micro-mentorship platform for working professionals
value.content:
AskMastr is where professionals go to get unstuck.
Have a work problem? Post it and get answers from experienced peers. Need deeper help? Book a quick, affordable 1-on-1 call with a vetted expert who’s been there.
Every solved challenge becomes a public “Snapshot” so others can learn too. Whether you’re seeking guidance or sharing your knowledge, AskMastr turns hidden expertise into real solutions.
View startup

value.title: onefreepage.com® – Create your free business profile & add more to your online branding
value.content:
onefreepage.com® is a free to join platform on which any company/business can claim a new backlink & add more to their search engine optimization (SEO) strategy.
Add your details, upload some images & link to your official website, reviews & socials – it’s simple. Creating your page is completely free - upgrade to PRO for more perks.
View startup

value.title: innerPrompt – AI journaling guided by your own pocket-sized life coach
value.content:
InnerPrompt turns the tables from prompt-engineering to self-engineering. Turn reflections into clear insights, guidance and measurable progress from intentional prompts.
Includes:
- Tracks patterns in mood, topics, and tone
- Gives you weekly feedback based on what you've written
- Helps you stay aligned with your chosen goals
- Builds a private profile that gets more accurate over time
If you've ever felt like journaling is just talking to yourself, this feels more like the start of a conversation.
View startup

value.title: Jotty – Save, organize, and share your code snippets, technical links, and notes
value.content:
Jotty is a developer-first knowledge base that makes it effortless to save, organize, and share your most valuable technical resources. Whether it’s a code snippet you want to reuse, a technical link worth keeping, or a personal note, Jotty keeps everything organized with tags and custom collections so you can find it instantly.
Designed for speed and simplicity, Jotty lets you save content in seconds and share it publicly or privately with just one click. Its clean, distraction-free interface is built specifically for developers, helping you stop wasting time searching for past work and start shipping faster.
View startup
